title: Dynamic Pipeline Support Across Cloud Orchestrators
description: ZenML now supports dynamic pipelines on AWS Sagemaker and Google Cloud Vertex orchestrators, enabling faster execution and more flexible workflow patterns. Dynamic pipelines can now be run from snapshots with configurable parameters, and include improvements to Kubernetes orchestrator handling and step mapping operations that return future objects with an `unpack()` method for better control flow.

title: Enhanced Cloud Infrastructure Configuration
description: Added regional location support to the GCP Image Builder, allowing users to specify Cloud Build regions for compliance and performance requirements. Improved Docker build options with better typing support for more reliable container image configuration across the SDK and CLI.

title: Panels are now resizable
description: You can now resize the panels in the dashboard to see more or less content at once. This is useful for when you want to see more or less information about a run or a pipeline.

title: Introducing Pipeline Deployments
description: Pipeline Deployments turn pipelines into persistent HTTP services with warm state, reducing cold start latency by 10–100x while maintaining full traceability. Learn more in our blog post.

title: New Timeline View for Runs
description: We've added a new timeline view for runs to help you visualize the execution of your pipelines.
